original_text: He was twenty-five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. His mother's name was Jerusha the daughter of Zadok.
korean_text: 나이가 이십오 세라 예루살렘에서 십육 년간 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 여루사라 사독의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: He was twenty-five years old when he began to reign
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 통치를 시작했을 때 스물다섯 살이었다.

sentences.original_text: he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예루살렘에서 열여섯 해 동안 통치했다.
